data.expected_result: The letters should not be cut off
data.short_description: Lowercase letters such as p and y cut off in names on instant invites page in server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server where you can manage instant invites - Make sure that the server has an invite created by a user with a lowercase p, y, q, j, or g in their name - Observer the bottom of those letters in the invite information box - Note: This also happens with unknown unicode boxes
